entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
